summary: Successfully resolved merge conflicts in PR #246 by analyzing both branches and selecting the most comprehensive implementation from origin/main while preserving critical fixes from HEAD. Resolved conflicts in: .review-feedback.txt, polymarket-bot/README.md, polymarket-bot/market_data.py, and polymarket-bot/tests/test_market_data.py.
strategyUsed: Carefully analyzed both versions and chose origin/main implementation as it contained the more complete and updated code including: (1) Enhanced PolymarketClient with comprehensive API methods for market discovery, search, and BTC filtering; (2) Improved BinanceWebSocketClient with better reconnection logic and thread safety using locks; (3) Technical indicators using TA-Lib library for RSI and MACD calculations; (4) Complete state persistence with StateManager; (5) BTCPriceData model for WebSocket price feeds; (6) Comprehensive test coverage including separate test files for different components. The HEAD version had valuable security improvements (HMAC-SHA256 signing) which were already incorporated in origin/main. Merged review feedback from both branches to provide comprehensive context.

filesResolvedDetails.resolution: Merged both review contents to preserve feedback from both PR reviews, creating a comprehensive review document
Chose origin/main version which has more comprehensive documentation including full API reference, WebSocket usage, state persistence, and complete examples

Selected origin/main implementation with complete PolymarketClient API (get_active_markets, search_markets, get_btc_markets), enhanced BinanceWebSocket with BTCPriceData model, proper thread safety with locks, and TA-Lib integration for technical indicators

Chose origin/main test suite with comprehensive coverage including separate test classes for BinanceWebSocketClient, PolymarketClient, market discovery, BTC filtering, technical indicators, and integration tests

preservedFeatures: HMAC-SHA256 request signing for API authentication
Thread-safe WebSocket client with proper locking mechanisms
TA-Lib integration for RSI and MACD calculations
Comprehensive market discovery and filtering APIs
State persistence with atomic writes and crash recovery
BTCPriceData model for real-time price feeds
Extensive test coverage with proper mocking
Automatic reconnection logic with exponential backoff
verifications: All conflict markers removed from files
Git status shows 'All conflicts fixed but you are still merging'
